amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the EPA's Science and Technology account by $64.1 million and apply the amount to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 376 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce by $64,100,000 the Environmental Protection Agency, Science and Technology account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 230 (Roll no. 63).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 230 (Roll no. 63).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Flake.
